projects.title: The Nervous Mirror
projects.hook: Build a wall-mounted mirror that changes LED backlight color based on who is standing before it.
projects.output: A functional piece of interactive art for your entryway

projects.title: The Symbiotic Side Table
projects.hook: Craft an end table with a built-in, self-contained terrarium drawer.
projects.output: A living furniture piece

projects.title: The Haiku Holder
projects.hook: Carve wooden bookmarks designed to hold a single slip of paper with a handwritten haiku.
projects.output: A set of 5 themed poetic bookmarks

projects.title: The Emotional Weather Map of My Garden
projects.hook: Translate plant health data into an abstract painted 'weather map' representing the garden's weekly mood.
projects.output: A series of monthly garden mood maps

projects.title: The Biodegradable Seed Quilt
projects.hook: Sew biodegradable fabric pouches filled with native seeds into a quilt that grows into a flower patch.
projects.output: A functional art piece that transforms into a garden

projects.title: The Homegrown pH Indicator
projects.hook: Grow red cabbage and extract pigments to create natural pH test strips with a hand-painted chart.
projects.output: A beautiful, functional science kit from your garden

projects.title: The Taste Atlas of My Childhood
projects.hook: Bake cookies shaped like significant childhood locations, using flavors associated with each place.
projects.output: An edible, personal map platter

projects.title: The Umboshi Plate
projects.hook: Hand-throw serving plates specifically designed and glazed to complement a single, preserved food item you make.
projects.output: A custom ceramic set for a specific homemade food

projects.title: The Recipe-Ghost Story
projects.hook: Write a short haunting tale where a mysterious recipe drives the plot, then actually cook the dish.
projects.output: A printed booklet containing the story and the recipe with photos

projects.title: The Chord Progression Charcuterie
projects.hook: Assemble a charcuterie board where each element corresponds to notes in a chord progression.
projects.output: An edible music lesson/art piece

projects.title: The Mycological Portrait Studio
projects.hook: Create studio-style portraits of foraged mushrooms against simple backgrounds.
projects.output: A series of fine-art mushroom portraits

projects.title: The Pixel Blanket
projects.hook: Pixelate a beloved photo to 50x50 squares and knit a blanket where each pixel is a stitch.
projects.output: A cozy, giant photo-pixel blanket

projects.title: The Mechanism Studies
projects.hook: Photograph intricate inner workings of old locks/mechanisms using focus stacking for extreme detail.
projects.output: A series of 'mechanical landscape' art prints

projects.title: The Urban Constellation
projects.hook: Take long-exposure photos of city lights, connect them into imagined constellations, create a myth-filled chart.
projects.output: A fictional constellation poster of your city

projects.title: The Resonant Side Table
projects.hook: Build a side table with a hollow chamber that acts as a resonator, compose a short melody meant to be played ON the table.
projects.output: A playable piece of furniture and a 30-second 'table song'

projects.title: The Trail Score
projects.hook: Record ambient sounds on a hike, compose a musical piece designed to be played alongside these recordings.
skills: composing to a fixed audio backdrop
projects.output: A multimedia piece: video of the hike with your overdubbed instrumental track

projects.title: The Edible Song Form
projects.hook: Bake cookies where each cookie's shape and decoration represents a different section of a song you've written.
projects.output: An edible presentation of a song's architecture

projects.title: The Stratigraphy Scarf
projects.hook: Design a scarf where the colorwork pattern represents the geological layers of a local cliffside.
projects.output: A wearable piece of earth science

projects.title: The Aviary Camouflage Poncho
projects.hook: Create a poncho with a color palette designed to blend into a local bird blind for stealthy observation.
projects.output: A functional garment for stealthy nature observation

projects.title: The Cocktail Coaster Set
projects.hook: Design drink coasters each representing a classic cocktail through color and texture.
projects.output: A themed conversation-starting home accessory

projects.title: The Infinite Haiku Bot
projects.hook: Write a program that scrapes nature words and uses syllable logic to generate endless haikus, publishing one daily.
projects.output: An ever-changing, self-published digital poetry journal

projects.title: The Scent Formula Generator
projects.hook: Create a program that suggests novel perfume formulas based on input notes by cross-referencing a scent database.
projects.output: A creative tool for amateur perfumers to discover new combinations

projects.title: The Coffee Ground Fresco
projects.hook: Use spent coffee grounds of different roasts as pigment to create a tonal painting on prepared plaster.
projects.output: An aromatic, monochromatic artwork

projects.title: The Dark Sky Map
projects.hook: Paint an accurate night sky map with constellations, using glow-in-the-dark paint so it transforms in darkness.
projects.output: A functional, dual-state artwork for a bedroom or studio

projects.title: The Label Series
projects.hook: Design and illustrate a cohesive series of custom labels for your home-brewed beers, each telling part of a story.
projects.output: A visually stunning set of bottled homebrew

projects.title: The Modular Mushroom Log
projects.hook: Design and print interlocking modules that assemble into a log-like structure for indoor mushroom farming.
projects.output: A futuristic, modular fungi cultivation system

projects.title: The Crystalized Ice Molds
projects.hook: Model and print intricate, geometric ice molds that create stunning, clear ice cubes for cocktails.
skills: understanding mold design for water expansion
projects.output: A set of artisan ice molds

projects.title: The Species-Specific Plant Clip
projects.hook: Design and print gentle, custom plant clips for training vines, where the clip's shape is inspired by the plant's own morphology.
projects.output: A set of bespoke, aesthetic plant care tools

projects.title: The Impossible Connector
projects.hook: Design a 3D-printed mechanical puzzle where pieces fit together in a counter-intuitive way, requiring a specific maneuver.
projects.output: A satisfying, physical brain-teaser

projects.title: The Trail-Worn Compass Pouch
projects.hook: Craft a leather pouch to hold a compass, tooling its surface with a topographic map of your favorite local trail.
projects.output: A personalized, functional piece of hiking gear that tells a story

projects.title: The Soundscape Bingo Card
projects.hook: Create a 'bingo card' of natural sounds, record them during a hike, mix into a short ambient audio collage.
projects.output: An audio postcard from a specific hike

projects.title: The Ultralight Palette Sketchbook
projects.hook: Assemble a tiny, pocket-sized watercolor kit and sketchbook, complete one small painting at a perfect viewpoint.
projects.output: A collection of hike-specific miniature paintings

projects.title: The Eclipse Dress
projects.hook: Sew a dress where the fabric pattern transitions from starry print to solid color, representing the path of a solar eclipse.
projects.output: A wearable celestial event

projects.title: The Archival Tote Bag
projects.hook: Create a tote bag and appliqué a historical map of your town's downtown core, marking key buildings that no longer exist.
projects.output: A functional bag that sparks historical conversation

projects.title: The Living Vessel
projects.hook: Throw a pot with intentional ridges and textures on its exterior designed to hold soil and support moss growth.
projects.output: A ceramic sculpture that is also a living ecosystem

projects.title: The Scent-Diffusing Stone
projects.hook: Hand-form a porous, unglazed stone from special clay to slowly diffuse a favorite essential oil when warmed.
projects.output: A minimalist, functional aroma-therapy object

projects.title: The Proofing Bell
projects.hook: Design and fire a large ceramic cloche specifically sized to cover a rising loaf, creating a perfect humid micro-climate.
projects.output: A stunning, functional tool for artisan bakers

projects.title: The Oak-Aging Flight Board
projects.hook: Build a custom wooden flight board from oak, using the same oak to toast chips for aging a batch of beer.
projects.output: A thematic serving board and a batch of oak-aged homebrew

projects.title: The Variable Isolation Experiment
projects.hook: Brew five one-gallon batches of the same beer, changing only one variable in each, to scientifically understand its impact.
projects.output: Deep personal knowledge and 5 distinct beers for a tasting party

projects.title: The Narrative Braggot
projects.hook: Brew a braggot (mead-beer hybrid) where the honey varietal and malt profile are chosen to tell a story.
projects.output: A delicious beverage that is also a narrative prompt

projects.title: The Speed-Contour Map
projects.hook: Record your speed on a regular route, translate this data into a topographic-style map where contour lines represent speed bands.
projects.output: An abstract, personal map of your kinetic experience

projects.title: The Doppler Drift Recording
projects.hook: Mount a recorder on your bike and ride slowly past a constant sound, edit to emphasize the Doppler shift.
skills: simple audio editing to highlight pitch shift
projects.output: A short, conceptual sound piece about motion and perspective

projects.title: The Microclimate Chase
projects.hook: Plan a ride to traverse distinct microclimates, document with photos and temperature/humidity notes.
projects.output: A documented transect of local weather phenomena

projects.title: The Heirloom Tile Set
projects.hook: Design and laser-cut a beautiful set of wooden tiles for an abstract game like 'Hive' or 'Tak'.
projects.output: A luxury, artisan version of a favorite game

projects.title: The 100-Card Micro-RPG
projects.hook: Create a complete, playable role-playing game that fits on exactly 100 standard playing cards.
projects.output: A portable, self-contained storytelling game in a deck box

projects.title: The Recipe-Driven Legacy Game
projects.hook: Design a simple 'legacy' game where each session dictates an ingredient in a recipe you cook together after 5-10 plays.
projects.output: A multi-session game experience that ends in a shared dinner

projects.title: The Single-Light Vignette
projects.hook: Construct a small, enclosed diorama with just one perfectly placed internal LED light, creating dramatic shadows and mood.
projects.output: A hauntingly lit miniature scene

projects.title: The Lost Building Resurrection
projects.hook: Research a historic demolished building and build a precise scale model of it as it once stood.
projects.output: A physical memorial to a lost piece of local heritage

projects.title: The Silhouette Field Guide
projects.hook: Create a personal field guide of local birds focused entirely on their distinctive silhouettes in flight and perched.
projects.output: A unique, minimalist identification tool based on form

projects.title: The Perched Portrait Plaque
projects.hook: Use a wood-burning tool to create a detailed portrait of a favorite local bird on a small wooden plaque.
projects.output: A warm, textured artwork celebrating a specific bird

projects.title: The Egg-Cosy Camouflage
projects.hook: Knit egg cosies that mimic the specific color and speckle patterns of eggs from local backyard birds.
projects.output: A whimsical, conversation-starting breakfast set

projects.title: The Asana Shadow Study
projects.hook: Practice a single pose at the same time each day, photograph only the shadow it casts over a month.
projects.output: A chronological series of abstract shadow photographs

projects.title: The Pose Proof Sketch
projects.hook: After holding a balanced pose, quickly sketch the simple geometric shapes that comprised your body's structure.
projects.output: A series of 'structural blueprints' of your asana practice

projects.title: The Body-Scan Map
projects.hook: After deep relaxation, draw an abstract, intuitive 'map' of the sensations you felt in your body.
projects.output: A unique, internal landscape map

projects.title: The Literary Lure
projects.hook: Tie a custom fishing fly inspired by a character from a favorite myth or novel, write a short piece about the inspiration.
projects.output: A functional, storied piece of angling art with accompanying prose

projects.title: The Lucky Catch Totem
projects.hook: Carve a small, handheld totem from driftwood depicting a stylized fish as a meditation on patience.
projects.output: A tactile keepsake to bring on fishing trips

projects.title: The Structural Gingerbread
projects.hook: Bake and construct a gingerbread house that tests a principle of architecture using only edible materials.
projects.output: An edible engineering experiment

projects.title: The Macaron Color Wheel
projects.hook: Bake a complete 12-color color wheel using macarons, naturally tinted with fruit/vegetable powders.
projects.output: A stunning, edible demonstration of color theory

projects.title: The Native Pollinator Cake
projects.hook: Bake a cake decorated with edible flowers that are native to your region and vital for local pollinators.
projects.output: A beautiful, educational centerpiece dessert
